original_text: And it came to pass after these things, that the butler of the king of Egypt and his baker had offended their lord the king of Egypt.
korean_text: 그 후에 애굽 왕의 술 맡은 자와 떡 굽는 자가 그들의 주인 애굽 왕에게 범죄한지라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after these things
that the butler of the king of Egypt
and his baker had offended their lord
sentences.korean_translation: 과 그의 빵 만드는 자가 그들의 주인에게 죄를 지었으니
